title: JPY Longs Provide Better Risk-Reward Into BOJ Meeting, DBS Says
description: JPY longs provide a better risk-reward into BOJ’s two-day meeting that starts today, DBS Group Research said.

title: A federal appeals court paved the way for Pence to appear before the grand jury investigating Trump's efforts to remain in power after the 2020 election.
description: A federal appeals court paved the way for Pence to appear before the grand jury investigating Trump’s efforts to remain in power after the 2020 election.

title: Jack Teixeira Could Still Have Access to Classified Documents, Prosecutors Say
description: Hostile nations could aid the airman’s escape from the U.S., prosecutors say in arguing for his continued detention.

title: Blackmores Recommends Takeover Proposal by Kirin
description: Blackmores agreed to a takeover proposal by Kirin Holdings that values the Australian vitamin and supplement maker at about A$1.84 billion.

title: Justice Department Sues to Block Tennessee Restrictions on Transgender Healthcare
description: The law violates constitutional guarantee of equal protection, lawsuit says.

title: More »
description: A special type of gunpowder crucial to the U.S. military comes from just one factory. That factory blew up.

title: Gold Gains; Could Make Run Toward Record Highs
Oil Prices Edge Up in Morning Trade
Samsung Electronics' First-Quarter Profit Plunged
description: Samsung Electronics Co.’s first-quarter net profit slid 86% from a year earlier, with its semiconductor segment posting a large loss amid a downturn in the chip industry.

title: AI's Effects on Cybersecurity Concern U.S. Officials
description: Rush to deploy ChatGPT and other models may leave organizations open to unknown threats, hacks, cybersecurity officials say.

title: Brazilian Court Orders Suspension of Telegram Over Neo-Nazi Groups
description: Internet providers will have to suspend the messaging app, as court says Telegram failed to supply information on neo-Nazi groups connected to school shootings.
